### Welcome

I teach courses on biostatistics and data science [at
UBC](https://www.zoology.ubc.ca/person/vikram-baliga). I regularly instruct or
coordinate [BIOL
300](https://biologyprogram-2023.sites.olt.ubc.ca/files/2019/08/Syllabus_BIOL300_2019.pdf):
Fundamentals of Biostatistics. Future efforts may relate to [DSCI
100](https://ubc-dsci.github.io/dsci-100-student/) or courses that blend
biology, statistics, and data science.

Previously, I was a scientist (also at UBC) who used motion capture and virtual
reality to investigate flight control in birds. Data from such studies of
behavior and neuroscience can be extremely noisy. Making sense of information in
these contexts made me appreciate the importance of sanity checks and the design
of effective visualizations.
